sql:
SELECT 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710.序号, 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710.枢纽站信息, 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710.周边交通指南, 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710.公交线路信息, 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710.轨道线路信息, 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710.更新时间, 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710.共享时间, 
    shijiaotongweizhichaofeixianchanganjianchulijigouxinxi3678.服务机构名称 
FROM 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710 
JOIN 
    shijiaotongweizhichaofeixianchanganjianchulijigouxinxi3678 
ON 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710.序号 = shijiaotongweizhichaofeixianchanganjianchulijigouxinxi3678.序号 
WHERE 
    shijiaotongweichengkeyindaojichuxinxi3710.更新时间 = '指定日期' 
AND 
    shijiaotongweizhichaofeixianchanganjianchulijigouxinxi3678.服务机构名称 = '特定名称';
